activity.text:
I would like to work on this issue.
Apporach
- add CARE_DISABLE_PATIENT_LOGIN=true to env.
- Redirect / to /login if patient login is disabled in App.tsx
- Hide patient login tab and selector in Login.tsx

ETA  : 1 day
